cards.question: That is what ________ is. You suddenly understand something you've understood all your life, but in a new way.
Think wrongly, if you please, but in all cases think for _________.
Any human anywhere will blossom in a hundred unexpected talents and capacities simply by being given the ___________ to do so.
Trust no friend without ________, and love a woman, but no angel.
If a ______ is the movement of water embodied, given shape, then cat is a diagram and pattern of subtle air.
There is only one real ______ and that is to persuade oneself that the second best is anything but second best.
What is a hero without love for ________.
Borrowing is not much better than begging; just as lending with interest is not much better than __________.
